trans-unit.source: Provides an empty control that can be used to create other controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个可用来创建其他控件的空控件。

trans-unit.source: By extending <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> inherits all the standard positioning and mnemonic-handling code that is necessary in a user control.
trans-unit.target: 通过扩展<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>继承所有标准定位并在用户控件中是必需的助记键处理代码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> gives you the ability to create controls that can be used in multiple places within an application or organization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>使你能够创建可以在应用程序或组织内的多个位置中使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can include all the code needed for validation of common data you ask the user to input; some examples of this are email addresses (see Example section), telephone numbers, and postal codes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包括要求用户输入; 的常见数据验证的所需的所有代码一些示例包括电子邮件地址 （请参阅示例部分），电话号码和邮政编码。

trans-unit.source: Another efficient use of the user control is to simply preload a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with static items you commonly use in almost every application; some examples of this are countries/regions, cities, states, and office locations.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件的另一个有效地利用是只需预加载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>静态项与你通常使用几乎每个应用程序中; 此一些示例包括国家/地区、 城市、 州和办公地点。

trans-unit.source: For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创作自定义控件的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 Windows 窗体控件与.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: You might consider creating a namespace that contains several classes of user controls and compiling it into one DLL.
trans-unit.target: 你可以考虑创建一个包含多个用户控件类的命名空间并将其编译为一个 DLL。

trans-unit.source: This DLL can be referenced and distributed with the application or all applications within an organization.
trans-unit.target: 可以引用此 DLL，并将其与应用程序或组织内的所有应用程序一起分发。

trans-unit.source: This gives you the ability to reference the user control in many applications and save time laying out and coding the contained elements of the user control.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够以引用用户控件在许多应用程序并节省时间布局和编码的用户控件包含的元素。

trans-unit.source: A user control also gives you consistency within or across applications; for example, all address information input blocks will all have the same appearance and behavior.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件还为你提供一致性内或跨应用程序;例如，所有的地址信息输入的块将所有具有相同的外观和行为。

trans-unit.source: Consistency gives your application a more polished and professional appearance.
trans-unit.target: 一致性，该应用程序更具有精美而专业的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can host Windows Forms <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> derived classes inside of a form, on another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>, inside of Internet Explorer on a Web page, or inside a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control hosted on a form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以承载 Windows 窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>派生类在窗体中，在另一台内部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>，于在 Web 页上，还是在 Internet Explorer 内部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>窗体上承载的控件。

trans-unit.source: When hosting a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> inside of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control, you cannot turn off Visual Styles using the `META` tag value `MSThemeCompatible`.
trans-unit.target: 承载时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件，你无法关闭视觉样式使用`META`标记值`MSThemeCompatible`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Visual Styles, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 关于视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that for Smartphone applications, this control requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于智能手机应用程序，此控件需要 Windows 移动版本 5.0 软件智能手机。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> that can be reused in multiple applications to get user information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>可重复使用多个应用程序以获取用户信息。

trans-unit.source: This example adds several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> controls, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls and an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> to gather the user's information.
trans-unit.target: 此示例添加了多种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>来收集用户的信息。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the user's email address is validated in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider> object is used to give the user feedback if the data fails validation.
trans-unit.target: 此外，用户的电子邮件地址验证中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider>对象用于提供用户反馈，如果数据未通过验证。

trans-unit.source: The code is intended to be compiled into a DLL for reference in other applications.
trans-unit.target: 代码用于编译到的 DLL 时，其他应用程序中的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You do not typically create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>。

trans-unit.source: To create your own user control class, inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建您自己的用户控件类，从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> derived class, `MyCustomerInfoUserControl`, which was created in the example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>派生类， `MyCustomerInfoUserControl`，这在示例部分中创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The user control is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 该用户控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控件，并具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> is then added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>随后添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSize" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the control will resize itself.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件将如何调整其自身大小。

trans-unit.source: A value from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> 枚举中的一个值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not recognize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSizeMode%2A> property will function as though <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSizeMode%2A> was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>.
trans-unit.target: 不能识别的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性将像函数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSizeMode%2A>已设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>。

trans-unit.source: All controls that recognize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSizeMode%2A> property will, by default, grow to fit available space, but will not shrink below the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 识别的所有控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性，默认情况下，会以适应可用空间，但不是会缩小下面指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the control performs validation when the user changes focus to another control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户将焦点更改到另一个控件时控件如何执行验证。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoValidate" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoValidate" /> 枚举的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: The default value for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoValidate.EnablePreventFocusChange" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> 的默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoValidate.EnablePreventFocusChange" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidate" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidate" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: If your custom control performs any of its own validation, you will need to know when a developer using your control has changed the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidate%2A> property so that you can change your control's validation behavior accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你自定义控件将执行任何其自己的验证，你将需要了解开发人员使用您的控件的更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidate%2A>属性，以便能够相应地更改控件的验证行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> named `UserControl1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>名为`UserControl1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.AutoValidateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the user control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.BorderStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D>, the control has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.BorderStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D>，该控件具有凹陷的三维外观。

trans-unit.source: To display a flat, thin border, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.FixedSingle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示平面、 精简边框，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.FixedSingle>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the control becomes visible for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 在控件第一次变为可见之前发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as allocating resources used by the control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于执行任务，例如分配控件使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> is part of an MDI child form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event will occur each time the child form is shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>属于 MDI 子窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>子窗体将显示每次都将发生事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you should put any one-time initialization code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.%23ctor%2A> instead of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你应该将任何一次性初始化代码置于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.%23ctor%2A>而不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event occurs when the handle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件发生时的句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>创建。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, this can cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event to occur more than one time.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，这会导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件发生一次以上。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> is loaded, and again if the handle is recreated.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>加载时，并再次如果重新创建句柄。

trans-unit.source: (One way that a handle is recreated is by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.) To account for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event occurring more than one time, you should put any one time initialization code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor instead of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: (一种方法重新创建句柄是通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法。)若要为帐户<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件发生不止一次，你应该将初始化代码将在任何一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.%23ctor%2A>构造函数而不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you should not add data bindings to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此外，则不应添加到的数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> named `UserControl1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>名为`UserControl1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="CreateControl" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see langword="CreateControl" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnCreateControl%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnCreateControl%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnCreateControl" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnCreateControl" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnCreateControl" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnCreateControl" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load> event occurs after the control is created, but before the control becomes visible for the first time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.Load>创建该控件后，但在第一次，控件将变为可见之前发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnLoad%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnLoad%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与该控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Causes all of the child controls within a control that support validation to validate their data.
trans-unit.target: 使控件内支持验证的所有子控件都对其数据进行验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all of the children validated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功验证所有子级，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If called from the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated" /> event handlers, this method will always return <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是从 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> 或 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated" /> 事件处理程序调用的，则该方法将始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Places restrictions on which controls have their <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> event raised.
trans-unit.target: 添加对哪些控件可以引发其 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> 事件的限制。

trans-unit.source: Causes all of the child controls within a control that support validation to validate their data.
trans-unit.target: 使控件内支持验证的所有子控件都对其数据进行验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all of the children validated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功验证所有子级，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If called from the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated" /> event handlers, this method will always return <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是从 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating" /> 或 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated" /> 事件处理程序调用的，则该方法将始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。
